text: He musalamano! Jyare tamane kahevamam ave ke sabha'omam thoda khulla beso to tame khulla besi java, jethi allaha tamane(dareka vastu'omam) vadhare apase, ane jyare kahevamam ave ke ubha tha'i java to tame ubha tha'i java, allaha ta'ala tamara manthi te lokona, je imana vala'o che ane jemane jnana apavamam avyum che, darajja'o unca kari dese ane allaha ta'ala (dareka karyathi) je tame kari rahya cho (khuba ja) vakepha che
